description: Sum{T(i,j)}, 0<=j<=i, 0<=i<=n, where T is the array in A026374.
comments: Partial sums of A026383. Number of lattice paths from (0,0) that do not go to right of the line x=n, using the steps U=(1,1), D=(1,-1) and, at levels ...,-4,-2,0,2,4,..., also H=(2,0). Example: a(2)=8 because we have the empty path, U, D, UU, UD, DD, DU and H. - _Emeric Deutsch_, Feb 18 2004
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,5,-5).
maple: a[0]:=0:a[1]:=1:for n from 2 to 100 do a[n]:=5*a[n-2]+3 od: seq(a[n], n=1..29); - _Zerinvary Lajos_, Mar 17 2008
author: _Clark Kimberling_
